engine.components

Class FadeRemove

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.core.entity.EntityComponent
      • engine.components.RemoveComponent
        • engine.components.FadeRemove

  • public class FadeRemove
extends RemoveComponent
    A RemoveComponent that fades out until the entity disappears.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • FadeRemove

        public FadeRemove(Entity entity,
          double duration,
          int animationFrame,
          double solidityDuration)
        Creates a new FadeRemove
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity this component is attached to.
        duration - How long the fade out takes.
        animationFrame - If the entity has a sprite component, which animation frame should be jumped to before the fadeout sequence. If no jump is desired, specify -1.
        solidityDuration - How long the entity continues colliding with other objects before the collision component is remove.

        Description copied from class: RemoveComponent
        Called every update after the entity is removed.
        Specified by:
        removeUpdate in class RemoveComponent
        Parameters:
        delta - How much time has passed since the last update.
